ygData.subject: Re: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It really means nothing to anyone, however if they want Harmonic on the team, they usually listen to me.  Consequently, the people on the list I have are
ygData.messageBody:
> To bad me blacklisting someone in my book doesn't mean anything ;-). I've
> got a list of about 10 KS'ers and 2 "Ninja" looters. I tend to only party
> with people I know or people from my guild now. I hate that bad taste in my
> mouth when I get screwed.

It really means nothing to anyone, however if they want Harmonic on
the team, they usually listen to me. Consequently, the people on the
list I have are the same ones as the people who leads the majority of
the events, go figure. We've got good taste in bad people, lol.

Most of the people that have KS'd me didn't know it was me, since I
was in different form. I just write down their name, and let them
do their thing ;)

Harm.
